page.title: 09HEALTH Life of a Nurse
page.content: { {The day and life of Gillian Simon Gillian starts work about 7.30am.She has to get the patients up and washed then she gives them their breakfasts and gets them ready to see the doctor. Later she gives them their dinners. A nurse usually gets breaks throughout the day for her meals.Female nurses find that men are the easiest to look after in Hospital and older people the most difficult.She gets about six weeks holiday.The thing she likes about the Hospital is that it is well run and is in a pleasant part of the countryside.She lives in the nurses homes by the Hospital and goes to bed at about 11.00pm.She works 39 hours a week an 8 hour day.She is proud to wear her uniform and enjoys her job. Her most difficult task she finds is looking after distressed relatives.
